title: The Woods
material_description: Multi-channel installation, video, colour and audio
brief_description: The Woods is a video installation comprised of three documentaries on child film stars from the United States of America, Nigeria and India. ‘The Audition’ features Hollywood stars, ‘The Interview’ features Nollywood stars, and ‘The Rehearsal’ features Bollywood stars. The Woods was exhibited at ACMI as part of The Character exhibition in 2015.
